snippet: The telecommunications company would add critical spectrum to its wireless network if the deal went through, but analysts said Sprint might have to spend more than its proffered $2.90 a share.
abstract: The telecommunications company would add critical spectrum to its wireless network if the deal went through, but analysts said Sprint might have to spend more than its proffered $2.90 a share.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Sprint Offers $2.1 Billion for Clearwire and Its Spectrum
headline.print_headline: Sprint Offers $2.1 Billion for Clearwire and Its Spectrum
